name: Battle Panic
description:
Those insolent orcs have ravaged our lands for the last time. Assemble your forces and attack!

Mine gold, chop down trees, build buildings, train units, heal your army, and attack the bad guys directly, all with a simple tap. You choose your path to victory - make a huge army to overwhelm the orcs? Focus on a small, strong army supported by healing? Upgrade your town hall to tier 4 and attack the beasties directly? The choice is yours.

Earn precious upgrade points with each level you win, then spend those points on over 30 awesome skills. The better you play, the more points you earn! Featuring 12 unique maps, 3 difficulty levels, and 3 freeplay maps, Battle Panic will test your tap skills and smarts like never before.

Key Features:
* Epic battles with hundreds of units!
* Mine, harvest, build, recruit, heal, and attack all with a tap
* Multiple ways to win each level
* 12 challenging scenarios and 3 difficulty levels to test your skills
* 33 awesome upgrades, including 9 epic upgrades
* 8 Leaderboards to dominate, including 3 open-ended Freeplay boards

Free universal app, works on iPhone 4 and up, iPod touch 4 and up, and iPad 2 and up
